price: 67. Fi de vous tous et de ce que vous adorez en dehors d’Allah ! Entendrez-vous jamais raison ? »
arabic: أُفّٖ لَّكُمۡ وَلِمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: uffin lakum walimā taʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi afalā taʿqilūna
